Articles.Content:
I doubt it, but does anyone remember this old game (2003 I think)

Battle Engine Aquila, by lost toys, was a first-person futuristic warzone game.

The AI\'s of thousands of units all capable of doing numerous task all at once (not scripted), was amazing given the limits of back then, and the limits now.

The main aspect of the game was it\'s transforming ability, 'walker mode' and 'jet mode', along with different classes that give you different yet balanced powers and weapons.

Here is a trailer and a mission video I made awhile back:

http://www.youtube.com/user/MegaTim42?feature=mhee#p/u/24/925lxqe9inA

http://www.youtube.com/user/MegaTim42?feature=mhee#p/u/20/cVaW-MxW6EM
